trans-unit.source: Provides static methods for the creation, copying, deletion, moving, and opening of a single file, and aids in the creation of <xref href="System.IO.FileStream"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 提供静态方法用于创建、 复制、 删除、 移动和打开单个文件，并协助创建<xref href="System.IO.FileStream"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: To browse the .NET Framework source code for this type, see the [Reference Source](http://referencesource.microsoft.com/#mscorlib/system/io/file.cs#1c7421e464f67b7e).
trans-unit.target: 若要浏览此类型的.NET Framework 源代码，请参阅[引用源](http://referencesource.microsoft.com/#mscorlib/system/io/file.cs#1c7421e464f67b7e)。

trans-unit.source: Appends lines to a file, and then closes the file.
trans-unit.target: 向一个文件中追加行，然后关闭该文件。

trans-unit.source: If the specified file does not exist, this method creates a file, writes the specified lines to the file, and then closes the file.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的文件不存在，此方法将创建一个文件，该文件，向其中写入指定的行，然后关闭该文件。

trans-unit.source: The method creates the file if it doesn’t exist, but it doesn't create new directories.
trans-unit.target: 如果不存在，但它不会创建新目录，该方法将创建该文件。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the value of the `path` parameter must contain existing directories.
trans-unit.target: 因此，值`path`参数必须包含现有目录。

trans-unit.source: The file to append the lines to.
trans-unit.target: 要向其中追加行的文件。

trans-unit.source: The file is created if it doesn't already exist.
trans-unit.target: 如果它尚不存在，则创建该文件。

trans-unit.source: The lines to append to the file.
trans-unit.target: 要追加到文件中的行。

trans-unit.source: path is a zero-length string, contains only white space, or contains one more invalid characters defined by the method.
trans-unit.target: path是零长度字符串，仅包含空格，或包含一个由定义的多个无效字符方法。

trans-unit.source: Either path or contents is .
trans-unit.target: Either path or contents is .

trans-unit.source: path is invalid (for example, the directory doesn’t exist or it is on an unmapped drive).
trans-unit.target: path无效 （例如，目录不存在或它位于未映射的驱动器上）。

trans-unit.source: The file specified by path was not found.
trans-unit.target: 指定的文件 path 找不到。

trans-unit.source: An I/O error occurred while opening the file.
trans-unit.target: 打开文件时发生 I/O 错误。

trans-unit.source: path exceeds the system-defined maximum length.
trans-unit.target: path超过了系统定义的最大长度。

trans-unit.source: For example, on Windows-based platforms, paths must be less than 248 characters and file names must be less than 260 characters.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在基于 Windows 的平台上，路径必须少于 248 个字符，文件名必须少于 260 个字符。

trans-unit.source: path is in an invalid format.
trans-unit.target: path是无效的格式。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have permission to write to the file.
trans-unit.target: 调用方没有写入到文件的权限。

trans-unit.target: path指定的文件是只读的。

trans-unit.target: -或-path是一个目录。

trans-unit.source: Appends lines to a file by using a specified encoding, and then closes the file.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用指定编码，将行追加到文件，然后关闭该文件。

trans-unit.source: If the specified file does not exist, this method creates a file, writes the specified lines to the file, and then closes the file.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的文件不存在，此方法将创建一个文件，该文件，向其中写入指定的行，然后关闭该文件。

trans-unit.source: The method creates the file if it doesn’t exist, but it doesn't create new directories.
trans-unit.target: 如果不存在，但它不会创建新目录，该方法将创建该文件。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the value of the `path` parameter must contain existing directories.
trans-unit.target: 因此，值`path`参数必须包含现有目录。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to create a file that contains the following: - The results of a [LINQ to Objects](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) query on the lines of a file, as obtained by using the <xref:System.IO.File.ReadLines%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此方法创建包含以下文件:-的结果[LINQ to Objects](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)查询的文件的行，如使用获取<xref:System.IO.File.ReadLines%2A>方法。</xref:System.IO.File.ReadLines%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The contents of a collection that implements an <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> of strings.
trans-unit.target: 的实现的集合内容<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>的字符串。</xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>

trans-unit.source: Opens a file, appends the specified string to the file, and then closes the file.

trans-unit.source: If the file does not exist, this method creates a file, writes the specified string to the file, then closes the file.
trans-unit.target: 如果文件不存在，此方法将创建一个文件，将指定的字符串写入该文件，然后关闭该文件。

trans-unit.source: Given a string and a file path, this method opens the specified file, appends the string to the end of the file, and then closes the file.
trans-unit.target: 此方法给定字符串和文件路径，在打开指定的文件，将字符串追加到文件的末尾，然后关闭该文件。

trans-unit.source: The file handle is guaranteed to be closed by this method, even if exceptions are raised.
trans-unit.target: 文件句柄保证即将关闭此方法，即使引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref:System.IO.StreamWriter> that appends UTF-8 encoded text to an existing file, or to a new file if the specified file does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 创建<xref:System.IO.StreamWriter>的 utf-8 编码将文本追加到现有文件，或新文件如果指定的文件不存在。</xref:System.IO.StreamWriter>

trans-unit.target: 如果指定的文件`path`不存在，则创建它。

trans-unit.source: If the file does exist, write operations to the <xref:System.IO.StreamWriter> append text to the file.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在该文件，写入到操作<xref:System.IO.StreamWriter>将文本追加到文件。</xref:System.IO.StreamWriter>

trans-unit.source: Additional threads are permitted to read the file while it is open.
trans-unit.target: 允许其他线程处于打开状态时读取文件。

trans-unit.source: The `path` parameter is permitted to specify relative or absolute path information.
trans-unit.target: `path`参数允许指定相对或绝对路径信息。

trans-unit.source: Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.
trans-unit.target: 相对路径信息被解释为相对于当前工作目录。

trans-unit.source: Decrypts a file that was encrypted by the current account using the <xref:System.IO.File.Encrypt*> method.
trans-unit.target: 解密由当前帐户使用加密的文件<xref:System.IO.File.Encrypt*>方法。</xref:System.IO.File.Encrypt*>

trans-unit.source: The Decrypt method allows you to decrypt a file that was encrypted using the <xref:System.IO.File.Encrypt%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 解密方法允许你使用加密文件进行解密<xref:System.IO.File.Encrypt%2A>方法。</xref:System.IO.File.Encrypt%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Decrypt method can decrypt only files that were encrypted using the current user account.
trans-unit.target: 解密方法可以解密使用当前用户帐户加密的文件。

trans-unit.source: The Decrypt method requires exclusive access to the file being decrypted, and will raise an exception if another process is using the file.
trans-unit.target: 解密方法要求对正在解密文件的独占访问权限，并且，如果另一个进程正在使用该文件将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: If the file is not encrypted, Decrypt will return a nonzero value, which indicates success.
trans-unit.target: 如果未加密文件，解密将返回非零值，该值指示成功。

trans-unit.source: Encrypts a file so that only the account used to encrypt the file can decrypt it.
trans-unit.target: 将某个文件加密，使得只有用于加密该文件的帐户可以对其进行解密。

trans-unit.source: The Encrypt method allows you to encrypt a file so that only the account used to call this method can decrypt it.
trans-unit.target: 加密方法允许你的文件进行加密，使得仅用来调用此方法的帐户可以对其进行解密。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IO.File.Decrypt%2A> method to decrypt a file encrypted by the Encrypt method.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IO.File.Decrypt%2A>方法以解密加密的加密方法的文件。</xref:System.IO.File.Decrypt%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Encrypt method requires exclusive access to the file being encrypted, and will fail if another process is using the file.
trans-unit.target: 加密方法要求对所加密的文件独占访问权，并且如果另一个进程正在使用该文件将失败。

trans-unit.source: Both the Encrypt method and the <xref:System.IO.File.Decrypt%2A> method use the cryptographic service provider (CSP) installed on the computer and the file encryption keys of the process calling the method.
trans-unit.target: 这两种加密方法和<xref:System.IO.File.Decrypt%2A>方法使用安装在计算机和调用方法的过程的文件加密密钥的加密服务提供程序 (CSP)。</xref:System.IO.File.Decrypt%2A>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified file exists.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定的文件是否存在。

trans-unit.source: The Exists method should not be used for path validation, this method merely checks if the file specified in `path` exists.
trans-unit.target: Exists 方法不应该用于路径验证，此方法只检查中指定的文件是否`path`存在。

trans-unit.source: Passing an invalid path to Exists returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 将无效的路径传递给 Exists 返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: To check whether the path contains any invalid characters, you can call the <xref:System.IO.Path.GetInvalidPathChars%2A> method to retrieve the characters that are invalid for the file system.
trans-unit.target: 若要检查的路径是否包含任何无效字符，可以调用<xref:System.IO.Path.GetInvalidPathChars%2A>方法来检索文件系统对于无效的字符。</xref:System.IO.Path.GetInvalidPathChars%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also create a regular expression to test the whether the path is valid for your environment.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以创建要测试是否正则表达式的路径对于你的环境是否有效。

trans-unit.source: For examples of acceptable paths, see <xref:System.IO.File>.
trans-unit.target: 有关可接受的路径的示例，请参阅<xref:System.IO.File>。</xref:System.IO.File>

trans-unit.source: To check if a directory exists, see <xref:System.IO.Directory.Exists%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 若要检查如果目录存在，请参阅<xref:System.IO.Directory.Exists%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.IO.Directory.Exists%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Be aware that another process can potentially do something with the file in between the time you call the Exists method and perform another operation on the file, such as <xref:System.IO.File.Delete%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 要注意，另一个进程可以可能进行一些处理时间之间的文件调用 Exists 方法并执行该文件，如<xref:System.IO.File.Delete%2A>.</xref:System.IO.File.Delete%2A>的另一个操作

trans-unit.source: The `path` parameter is permitted to specify relative or absolute path information.
trans-unit.target: `path`参数允许指定相对或绝对路径信息。

trans-unit.source: Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.
trans-unit.target: 相对路径信息被解释为相对于当前工作目录。

trans-unit.source: To obtain the current working directory, see <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If `path` describes a directory, this method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`path`描述一个目录，此方法返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: Trailing spaces are removed from the `path` parameter before determining if the file exists.
trans-unit.target: 从删除尾随空格`path`之前确定文件是否存在的参数。

trans-unit.source: The Exists method returns `false` if any error occurs while trying to determine if the specified file exists.
trans-unit.target: Exists 方法返回`false`如果在尝试确定指定的文件是否存在任何错误时发生。

trans-unit.source: This can occur in situations that raise exceptions such as passing a file name with invalid characters or too many characters, a failing or missing disk, or if the caller does not have permission to read the file.
trans-unit.target: 在引发异常，例如传递具有无效的字符或太多字符，磁盘失效或缺失的文件名的情况下可能发生这或如果调用方没有权限读取此文件。

trans-unit.target: 此方法也返回如果 path 是 ，一个无效路径或零长度字符串。

trans-unit.source: Moves a specified file to a new location, providing the option to specify a new file name.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的文件移到新位置，提供要指定新文件名的选项。

trans-unit.source: This method works across disk volumes, and it does not throw an exception if the source and destination are the same.
trans-unit.target: 此方法适用于整个磁盘卷，并且它不会引发异常，如果源和目标相同。

trans-unit.source: Note that if you attempt to replace a file by moving a file of the same name into that directory, you get an <xref:System.IO.IOException>.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，是否你尝试通过将具有相同名称的文件移到该目录替换文件，你会获得<xref:System.IO.IOException>.</xref:System.IO.IOException>

trans-unit.source: You cannot use the Move method to overwrite an existing file.
trans-unit.target: Move 方法不能用于覆盖现有文件。

trans-unit.source: The `sourceFileName` and `destFileName` arguments can include relative or absolute path information.
trans-unit.target: `sourceFileName`和`destFileName`自变量可以包括相对或绝对路径信息。

trans-unit.source: Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.
trans-unit.target: 相对路径信息被解释为相对于当前工作目录。

trans-unit.source: To obtain the current working directory, see <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取当前工作目录，请参阅<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>。</xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you try to move a file across disk volumes and that file is in use, the file is copied to the destination, but it is not deleted from the source.

trans-unit.source: The OpenWrite method opens a file if one already exists for the file path, or creates a new file if one does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个已存在的文件路径，或创建一个新文件，如果不存在，则 OpenWrite 方法打开文件。

trans-unit.source: For an existing file, it does not append the new text to the existing text.
trans-unit.target: 对于现有的文件，它不会不新将文本追加到现有的文本。

trans-unit.source: Instead, it overwrites the existing characters with the new characters.
trans-unit.target: 相反，它将用新的字符覆盖现有的字符。

trans-unit.source: If you overwrite a longer string (such as “This is a test of the OpenWrite method”) with a shorter string (such as “Second run”), the file will contain a mix of the strings (“Second runtest of the OpenWrite method”).
trans-unit.target: 如果使用较短字符串 （如"第二次运行"） （例如"This is OpenWrite 方法的测试)"覆盖较长的字符串，则文件将包含多种字符串 ("第二个 runtest OpenWrite 方法的")。

trans-unit.source: The `path` parameter may specify relative or absolute path information.
trans-unit.target: `path`参数可以指定相对或绝对路径信息。

trans-unit.source: Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.
trans-unit.target: 相对路径信息被解释为相对于当前工作目录。

trans-unit.source: To obtain the current working directory, use the <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A> method.

trans-unit.source: Reads the lines of a file.
trans-unit.target: 读取文件的行。

trans-unit.source: The ReadLines and <xref:System.IO.File.ReadAllLines%2A> methods differ as follows: When you use ReadLines, you can start enumerating the collection of strings before the whole collection is returned; when you use <xref:System.IO.File.ReadAllLines%2A>, you must wait for the whole array of strings be returned before you can access the array.
trans-unit.target: ReadLines 和<xref:System.IO.File.ReadAllLines%2A>方法的行为有所不同，如下所示︰ 当你使用 ReadLines 时，你可以启动之前，则返回整个集合枚举字符串的集合; 当你使用<xref:System.IO.File.ReadAllLines%2A>，必须等待之前才能访问该数组返回整个字符串的数组。</xref:System.IO.File.ReadAllLines%2A> </xref:System.IO.File.ReadAllLines%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, when you are working with very large files, ReadLines can be more efficient.
trans-unit.target: 因此，当您正在使用非常大的文件，ReadLines 可以更高效。

trans-unit.source: You can use the ReadLines method to do the following: - Perform [LINQ to Objects](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) queries on a file to obtain a filtered set of its lines.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用 ReadLines 方法执行以下操作:-执行[LINQ to Objects](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)文件以获取经过筛选的其行集上的查询。

trans-unit.source: - Write the returned collection of lines to a file with the <xref:System.IO.File.WriteAllLines%28System.String%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7BSystem.String%7D%29?displayProperty=fullName> method, or append them to an existing file with the <xref:System.IO.File.AppendAllLines%28System.String%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7BSystem.String%7D%29?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: -向文件写入的行返回的集合<xref:System.IO.File.WriteAllLines%28System.String%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7BSystem.String%7D%29?displayProperty=fullName>方法，或将它们追加到现有文件与<xref:System.IO.File.AppendAllLines%28System.String%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7BSystem.String%7D%29?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.IO.File.AppendAllLines%28System.String%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7BSystem.String%7D%29?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.IO.File.WriteAllLines%28System.String%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7BSystem.String%7D%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: - Create an immediately populated instance of a collection that takes an <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> collection of strings for its constructor, such as a <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601> or a <xref:System.Collections.Generic.Queue%601>.
trans-unit.target: -创建立即填充的集合获取<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>其构造函数，如<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601>或<xref:System.Collections.Generic.Queue%601>。</xref:System.Collections.Generic.Queue%601></xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601>的字符串集合</xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>的实例

trans-unit.source: Therefore, when you are working with very large files, ReadLines can be more efficient.

trans-unit.source: Replaces the contents of a specified file with the contents of another file, deleting the original file, and creating a backup of the replaced file.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的文件的内容替换另一个文件，删除原始文件，并创建被替换文件的备份的内容。

trans-unit.source: The Replace method replaces the contents of a specified file with the contents of another file.
trans-unit.target: Replace 方法将指定文件的内容替换另一个文件的内容。

trans-unit.source: It also creates a backup of the file that was replaced.
trans-unit.target: 它还将创建被替换文件的备份。

trans-unit.source: If the `sourceFileName` and `destinationFileName` are on different volumes, this method will raise an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果`sourceFileName`和`destinationFileName`是在不同的卷上，此方法将引发的异常。

trans-unit.source: If the `destinationBackupFileName` is on a different volume from the source file, the backup file will be deleted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`destinationBackupFileName`是将源文件中的其他卷上, 删除备份文件。

trans-unit.source: Pass `null` to the `destinationBackupFileName` parameter if you do not want to create a backup of the file being replaced.
trans-unit.target: 传递`null`到`destinationBackupFileName`参数，如果你不想要创建被替换文件的备份。

trans-unit.source: The name of a file that replaces the file specified by `destinationFileName`.
trans-unit.target: 替换指定的文件的文件的名称`destinationFileName`。

trans-unit.source: The name of the file being replaced.
trans-unit.target: 被替换文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the backup file.
trans-unit.target: 备份文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: Replaces the contents of a specified file with the contents of another file, deleting the original file, and creating a backup of the replaced file and optionally ignores merge errors.

trans-unit.source: It also creates a backup of the file that was replaced.

trans-unit.target: 如果`sourceFileName`和`destinationFileName`是在不同的卷上，此方法将引发的异常。

trans-unit.source: Applies access control list (ACL) entries described by a <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity"></xref> object to the specified file.
trans-unit.target: 将访问控制列表 (ACL) 项所描述应用<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity"></xref>到指定的文件的对象。

trans-unit.source: The SetAccessControl method applies access control list (ACL) entries to a file that represents the noninherited ACL list.
trans-unit.target: SetAccessControl 方法适用于表示非继承的 ACL 列表的文件的访问控制列表 (ACL) 项。

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > The ACL specified for the `fileSecurity` parameter replaces the existing ACL for the file.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!CAUTION]&1;> 为 ACL 指定`fileSecurity`参数替换现有文件 ACL。

trans-unit.source: To add permissions for a new user, use the <xref:System.IO.File.GetAccessControl%2A> method to obtain the existing ACL, modify it, and then use SetAccessControl to apply it back to the file.
trans-unit.target: 若要添加的新用户的权限，请使用<xref:System.IO.File.GetAccessControl%2A>方法来获取现有的 ACL，对其进行修改，然后使用 SetAccessControl 以将其应用回文件。</xref:System.IO.File.GetAccessControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: An ACL describes individuals and/or groups who have, or do not have, rights to specific actions on the given file.
trans-unit.target: ACL 描述个人和/或组具有或没有执行到给定的文件上的特定操作的权限。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Add or Remove Access Control List Entries](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何︰ 添加或移除访问控制列表项](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The SetAccessControl method persists only <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity> objects that have been modified after object creation.
trans-unit.target: SetAccessControl 方法仍然仅存在<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>对象创建后已修改的对象。</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity> object has not been modified, it will not be persisted to a file.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>尚未修改对象，它不会保留到文件。</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, it is not possible to retrieve a <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity> object from one file and reapply the same object to another file.
trans-unit.target: 因此，不能检索<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>对象从一个文件，并重新对同一对象应用到另一个文件。</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>

trans-unit.source: To copy ACL information from one file to another: 1.
trans-unit.target: 若要将 ACL 信息从一个文件复制到另一个︰ 1。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IO.File.GetAccessControl%2A> method to retrieve the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity> object from the source file.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IO.File.GetAccessControl%2A>方法来检索<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>源文件中的对象。</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity> </xref:System.IO.File.GetAccessControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: Create a new <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity> object for the destination file.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>目标文件的对象。</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.GetSecurityDescriptorBinaryForm%2A> or <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.GetSecurityDescriptorSddlForm%2A> method of the source <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity> object to retrieve the ACL information.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.GetSecurityDescriptorBinaryForm%2A>或<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.GetSecurityDescriptorSddlForm%2A>方法的源<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>要检索 ACL 信息对象。</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.GetSecurityDescriptorSddlForm%2A> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.GetSecurityDescriptorBinaryForm%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.SetSecurityDescriptorBinaryForm%2A> or <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.SetSecurityDescriptorSddlForm%2A> method to copy the information retrieved in step 3 to the destination <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.SetSecurityDescriptorBinaryForm%2A>或<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.SetSecurityDescriptorSddlForm%2A>方法的信息复制到目标的步骤 3 中检索<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>对象。</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.SetSecurityDescriptorSddlForm%2A> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.SetSecurityDescriptorBinaryForm%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set the destination <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity> object to the destination file using the SetAccessControl method.
trans-unit.target: 设置目标<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>目标文件使用 SetAccessControl 方法的对象。</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>

trans-unit.source: In NTFS environments, <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights> and <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights> are granted to the user if the user has <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights> rights on the parent folder.
trans-unit.target: 在 NTFS 环境中，<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>和<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>如果用户具有向用户授予<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>上的父文件夹的权限。</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>

trans-unit.source: To deny <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights> and <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>, deny <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights> on the parent directory.
trans-unit.target: 若要拒绝<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>和<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>，拒绝<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>上的父目录。</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>

trans-unit.source: A file to add or remove access control list (ACL) entries from.
trans-unit.target: 要添加或移除访问控制列表 (ACL) 项的文件。

trans-unit.source: The `path` parameter is permitted to specify relative or absolute path information.
trans-unit.target: `path`参数允许指定相对或绝对路径信息。

trans-unit.source: Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.
trans-unit.target: 相对路径信息被解释为相对于当前工作目录。

trans-unit.source: To obtain the current working directory, see <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取当前工作目录，请参阅<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>。</xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>

trans-unit.source: Certain file attributes, such as <xref:System.IO.FileAttributes> and <xref:System.IO.FileAttributes>, can be combined.
trans-unit.target: 某些文件属性，如<xref:System.IO.FileAttributes>和<xref:System.IO.FileAttributes>，可以组合。</xref:System.IO.FileAttributes> </xref:System.IO.FileAttributes>

trans-unit.source: Other attributes, such as <xref:System.IO.FileAttributes>, must be used alone.
trans-unit.target: 其他特性，例如<xref:System.IO.FileAttributes>，必须单独使用。</xref:System.IO.FileAttributes>

trans-unit.source: It is not possible to change the compression status of a <xref:System.IO.File> object using the SetAttributes method.
trans-unit.target: 不能更改的压缩状态<xref:System.IO.File>对象使用 SetAttributes 方法。</xref:System.IO.File>

trans-unit.source: NTFS-formatted drives may cache file meta-info, such as file creation time, for a short period of time.
trans-unit.target: NTFS 格式化的驱动器可能缓存文件元信息，例如短时间内的文件创建时间。

trans-unit.source: As a result, it may be necessary to explicitly set the creation time of a file if you are overwriting or replacing an existing file.
trans-unit.target: 因此，可能有必要显式设置文件的创建时间，如果要覆盖或替换现有文件。

trans-unit.source: NTFS-formatted drives may cache file meta-info, such as file creation time, for a short period of time.

trans-unit.source: As a result, it may be necessary to explicitly set the creation time of a file if you are overwriting or replacing an existing file.

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to create a file that contains the following: - The results of a [LINQ to Objects](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) query on the lines of a file, as obtained by using the <xref:System.IO.File.ReadLines%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此方法创建包含以下文件:-的结果[LINQ to Objects](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)查询的文件的行，如使用获取<xref:System.IO.File.ReadLines%2A>方法。</xref:System.IO.File.ReadLines%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The contents of a collection that implements an <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> of strings.
trans-unit.target: 的实现的集合内容<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>的字符串。</xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>

trans-unit.source: This method uses UTF-8 encoding without a Byte-Order Mark (BOM), so using the <xref:System.Text.Encoding.GetPreamble%2A> method will return an empty byte array.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用 utf-8 编码而无需字节顺序标记 (BOM)，因此使用<xref:System.Text.Encoding.GetPreamble%2A>方法将返回一个空字节数组。</xref:System.Text.Encoding.GetPreamble%2A>

trans-unit.source: If it is necessary to include a UTF-8 identifier, such as a byte order mark, at the beginning of a file, use the <xref:System.IO.File.WriteAllText%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Text.Encoding%29> method overload with <xref:System.Text.Encoding.UTF8%2A> encoding.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要包含 utf-8 的标识符，如字节顺序标记，在文件的开头使用<xref:System.IO.File.WriteAllText%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Text.Encoding%29>方法重载<xref:System.Text.Encoding.UTF8%2A>编码。</xref:System.Text.Encoding.UTF8%2A> </xref:System.IO.File.WriteAllText%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Text.Encoding%29>
